players.name: Alice
memory: Bob: "I am not the mafioso. I was silent last night because I didn't see anyone suspicious."
You: "Let's investigate Diana, she said she was the mafioso."
Diana: "I am not the mafioso. I was telling the truth last night when I said so, but now that Alice has accused me, I want to clarify my stance."
Votes: Alice voted for Bob, Bob voted for Diana, Diana voted for Bob

players.name: Diana
memory: You investigated Alice and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Bob: "I am not the mafioso. I was silent last night because I didn't see anyone suspicious."
Alice: "Let's investigate Diana, she said she was the mafioso."
You: "I am not the mafioso. I was telling the truth last night when I said so, but now that Alice has accused me, I want to clarify my stance."
